posts.post_title: ALL SOLD! T216 Peoples Tobacco cards. HOFers, Kottons, MINOs
posts.post_content:
All cards have been sold

FINAL PRICE REDUCTIONS....AND MY BOTTOM LINE ON EACH

Asking prices are next to each card.

Payment by Check, MO, or Paypal as a gift (preferred), or straight up Paypal.

First to email me with intent to purchase at: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url] gets those cards.

FINAL PRICE REDUCTIONS.  AND MY BOTTOM LINE.......

Here's the List of available cards:

1. Ty Cobb (Detroit Am., standing) Kotton type 3, SGC A.  HOFer.... SOLD
2. Nap Lajoie (fielding, Cleveland) Kotton type 3, SGC 10.  HOFer.... SOLD 
3. Rube Marquard, MINO, SGC 10.  HOFer....SOLD
NM....screwed this post up.  See below for last 5 scans.
Scans moved to first post. Down to 10 remaining.

Will listen to REASONABLE offers on any of the remaining cards.  

I will also consider payment plans, if needed.  I'm pretty flexible.  

Thanks for looking.

1 last BUMP with my final price reductions.  The last 6 are priced to move.  

3 MINO's left, and still a few HOFers.
